mapper.select: SELECT *, COUNT((SELECT iquestion FROM t_product_question WHERE A.parent = iquestion )) AS cnt FROM t_product_question A WHERE parent > 0 AND parent = ${iquestion} GROUP BY parent

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.iquestion, A.rdt, A.ctnt, B.uid, B.nm , C.idetail, C.img , D.nm AS productNm, D.product_code FROM t_product_question A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_product_detail C ON C.idetail = A.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE parent = 0 LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${rowCnt} ) AS t ORDER BY ${type} DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.iquestion, A.rdt, A.ctnt, B.uid, B.nm , C.idetail, C.img , D.nm AS productNm, D.product_code FROM t_product_question A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_product_detail C ON C.idetail = A.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE iquestion NOT IN (
SELECT parent FROM t_product_question A WHERE parent > 0 ) AND parent = 0 LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${rowCnt} ) AS t ORDER BY ${type} DESC

SELECT COUNT(iquestion) AS result FROM ( SELECT A.iquestion, D.nm, C.idetail, C.img , B.uid, A.rdt, C.color FROM t_product_question A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_product_detail C ON C.idetail = A.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE iquestion NOT IN ( SELECT parent FROM t_product_question A WHERE parent > 0 ) AND parent = 0 ) AS t ORDER BY ${type} DESC

SELECT COUNT(iquestion) AS result FROM ( SELECT A.iquestion, D.nm, C.idetail, C.img , B.uid, A.rdt, C.color, A.parent FROM t_product_question A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_product_detail C ON C.idetail = A.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE parent = 0 ) AS t ORDER BY ${type} DESC
